column4: Anybody know if there's a problem with the 7.04->7.10 do_release_upgrade? I tried it several times, it seems to copy a LOT of stuff then fails on http://archive.ubuntu.com gutsy/main packages .. it says its a network problem.. pretty sure its not on my end.. been going on since the release of 7.10...
have you tried a different mirror?
go to System -> Administration -> Software Properties and select a different mirror... somewhere close, but make sure it isn't the same mirror as the one you are currently using
then sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.lst .... change the deb http://yourmirrorhere/gutsy main to something else. Get a list of mirrors from ubuntu.com
